Houseboat: If there's a river or a lake nearby, I would convert a boat into a houseboat. It would be a unique and mobile living space.
Van Conversion: If I have access to a van, I would convert it into a mobile home. It would be a practical and flexible living space.
Tiny House: I would build a tiny house in my backyard. It would be a small, efficient, and affordable living space.
RV: If I have access to an RV, I would use it as a temporary living space. It would be a convenient and comfortable way to travel and live.
Cave Dwelling: If there's a cave nearby, I would convert it into a cave dwelling. It would be a unique and natural living space.
